contentrichtext.text: {{Unreferenced|date=December 2009}} {{Infobox Album <!-- See Wikipedia:WikiProject_Albums --> | Name = Twins | Type = ep | Artist = [[Twins (musical group)|Twins]] | Cover = | Released = {{Start date|2002|1}} | Recorded = | Genre = [[Cantopop]] | Length = | Label = [[Emperor Entertainment Group]] | Producer = | Reviews = | Last album = ''[[Twins' Love]]''<br>(2001) | This album = '''''Twins'''''<br>(2002) | Next album = ''[[Our Souvenir]]<br>(2002) }} '''''Twins''''' is an [[Extended play|EP]] by [[Twins (musical group)|Twins]]. This was their third CD and was released in January 2002. It contained a CD, which had five new songs, and a VCD, which included two music videos for "Ma Bao 668" (孖寶668) and "Ai Qing Dang Ru Xun" (愛情當入樽). Since it was near the [[Chinese New Year]], the song "Ma Bao 668" (孖寶668) was a greeting song for the [[Chinese New Year]]. ==Track listing== #"Zhu Shui Yi Shui Jiao" (著睡衣睡覺) #"Da Lang Man Zhu Yi" (大浪漫主義) #"She Gu Che Zhan Jian" (涉谷車站見) #"Shen Qi Liang Nu Xia" (神奇兩女俠) #"Ma Bao 668" (孖寶668) {{Twins discography}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Twins (2002 Ep)}} [[Category:2002 EPs]] [[Category:Twins (group) EPs]] {{HongKong-album-stub}}
